page.title: 14A Day in the Life of Steven
page.content: My day starts at 7.25. I get up and go downstairs. Mum and Dad are already there. Breakfast is at 7.45. I get dressed and play with my toys until 8.40. I usually walk to school and arrive at 8.55. The bell goes and I walk in with the others. After prayers we usually do "Better English" and maths. At 10.30 it is playtime. We have Environmental Studies after break and then at 12.00 we have lunch. I like ham sandwiches for my lunch. During the big playtime I play army games with my friends. At 1.20 we get ready for music and games. After our afternoon playtime we have story time. At 3.20 we go home. I get changed, then play outside with my friend Simon. For dinner I like sausage and chips. After dinner I watch T.V., have a bath and at 8.30 I go to bed.
